title: Chickpea, spinach and onion fattoush

default: ½ beef tomato, de-seeded and finely chopped
3 mini white pitta breads, torn into small pieces
2 tbsp canned cooked chickpeas, rinsed and drained
1 tbsp balsamic vinegar, plus extra to serve

steps: Combine all of the ingredients in a bowl and mix thoroughly to combine. Serve on a plate with an extra drizzle of balsamic vinegar.
